alert.note: Alert for Adams; Franklin; Gosper; Kearney; Nuckolls; Phelps; Thayer; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 06 at 10:45AM CDT until April 06 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Very Strong northwest winds combined with marginal relative humidity values will result in Critical Fire Weather conditions across parts of the local area both Today and Thursday... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY... The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect until 8 PM CDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...In Nebraska, Fire Weather Zone 072 Gosper, Fire Weather Zone 073 Phelps, Fire Weather Zone 074 Kearney, Fire Weather Zone 075 Adams, Fire Weather Zone 084 Franklin, Fire Weather Zone 085 Webster, Fire Weather Zone 086 Nuckolls and Fire Weather Zone 087 Thayer. * WINDS...Sustained northwest 30 to 40 MPH with gusts up to 60 MPH. * TIMING...Until 8 PM today. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 25 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite may spread rapidly and exhibit extreme fire behavior. Use extreme caution if engaging in activities that could result in fire ignition.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Franklin; Gosper; Kearney; Nuckolls; Phelps; Thayer; Webster
